name: Pokémon Aragonite
summary:
Pokémon Aragonite is a fanmade project based on the real life island of Sicily, in the South of Italy.
Started by FrankieChatot and Darkonius Mavakar;
This project aim to reimagine Sicily into the Pokémon world by creating the Sylia region, where you will be able to explore many areas and cities based off actual places!
Initially this started as a fakemon dex where we had fun interpreting our culture, flora and fauna into Fakemon, but then we decided to use Pokémon Essentials to turn it into a playable game!
